Description: Papyrus; Abnormal Hieratic text: receipt for shabtis of Petekhons.
Curator's comments: Quack, J.F. 2022. Altägyptische Amulette und ihre Handhabung. Orientalische Religionen in der Antike 31. Tübingen, p. 11-12.
Published: Edwards, JEA 57 (1971): 120-4; N. Strudwick, Masterpieces of Ancient Egypt, London 2006, pp. 246-7. B. Menu, ENIM 4 (2011), 43, 46-8.
Translation and comment: Schneder, Shabtis I, 329-30
Published: F Poole 'R-DBA and pronoun Reference in the Decree for the Shabtis of Neskhons and P. BM EA 10800' GM 225 (2010), 83-7.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (51403) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/51403)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, fragile, insect attack Black ink Tabbed: kraft paper, silk Checked for loan to Paris 2003 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: fair
